name: Damaged (Shot out games)
description:
• Fight through five rooms and a Boss while gradually losing health
  • Use Pickups and Streak bonuses to regenerate and slow down health before your inevitable demise
  • LEFT CLICK to SHOOT
  • RIGHT CLICK to ATTACK
  • SPACE BAR to DASH
  • CONTROLS (GAMEPAD COMPATIBLE)
    • MOVE : WASD (LEFT STICK)
    • DASH : Space Bar (X BUTTON X-BOX)
    • SHOOT : Left Click (RIGHT TRIGGER)
    • ATTACK : (LEFT TRIGGER)
    • CAM ZOOM POV: Middle Click (D-PAD UP/DOWN)
  • GAMEPLAY TIPS
    • DASH has invincible frames
    • The lower your HEALTH the bigger the gain with pickups
